Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ELECTION LAW

Title: Relates to the accessibility of congressional, senatorial, assembly and election district maps
Summary: Requires congressional, senatorial, assembly and election district maps be made available on applicable board of elections' websites and in a downloadable Shapefile format.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the accessibility of congressional, senatorial, assembly and election district maps
